data.title: How to Watch the Oklahoma City Thunder Without Cable
data.meta_description: Keeping up with the OKC Thunder just got a whole lot easier. Check out this article to learn how you can watch Thunder games without cable.
data.text:
Since joining the NBA in 2008, The Oklahoma City Thunder have swiftly risen as a prominent force within the league’s Western Conference. Known for their dynamic players and passionate fans, the Thunder encapsulate the energy and spirit of Oklahoma, making a significant mark in the basketball world.

If you want to learn how to stream Thunder games, we can help. Many streaming services come with the channels you need to watch the Thunder live, and there are no long-term commitments. We’ll show you how to find the right platforms, so you can watch the most Thunder games live all season.

What Channels Show Oklahoma City Thunder Games?

To watch a Thunder game live online, you need Bally Sports Oklahoma, TNT, ESPN, and NBA TV. It’s also a smart plan to have a streaming service with ABC. That way, should the Thunder make the NBA Finals again, you have a way to stream them.

Streaming the Oklahoma City Thunder Live Without Cable

This table shows you all the streaming services that carry the channels you need so you can find the best fit:

* requires an add-on

How to Watch the Oklahoma City Thunder on DIRECTV STREAM

Price: $84.99/mo.

Free trial: 5 days

DVR hours: Unlimited

Sign up here

DIRECTV STREAM offers Bally Sports Oklahoma. It also comes with ESPN, TNT, and ABC. Additionally, NBA TV is included at no extra charge. These channels allow you to watch most of the Thunder games with the Choice plan for $84.99 per month,

The platform is also different in that you can house your favorite entertainment apps like Netflix on its interface. If you do not have a smart TV, the equipment gives you a way to operate your TV like it is a smart one.

See our review on DIRECTV STREAM for more information.

How to Watch the Oklahoma City Thunder on Fubo

Price: Starts at $85.99/mo.

Free trial: 7 days

DVR hours: 1000

Sign up here

Fubo gives you many ways to catch a Thunder live stream. The service features Bally Sports Oklahoma, ESPN and ABC. You can also receive NBA TV for another $10.99/per month.

Also, Fubo does not carry TNT, which is a big deal for fans wanting to watch Thunder online, as the channel airs many primetime and playoff contests. Of course, you can always use NBA League Pass to complement this if you are a Oklahoma City fan who lives out of the area. Fubo comes with over 110 channels in its base package for $74.99/mo.

See our review on Fubo for more information.

You can check it out for free for 7 days.

Sign up for Fubo

How to watch the Oklahoma City Thunder on NBA League Pass

If you want to discover how to watch Thunder games online, NBA League Pass is a smart place to start. It features every NBA game available, except those blacked out in your area, and comes with full and condensed replays. While blacked-out games can’t be watched live, you can catch replays three hours after the broadcast ends. Due to the blackout rules, fans who can get the most use of NBA League Pass are those who are out of market.

Overall, NBA League Pass is a wise option to supplement your NBA content needs.
